<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">NVPTXPrologEpilogPass::calculateFrameObjectOffsets(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;Fn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering">TargetFrameLowering</a> &amp;TFI = &#42;Fn.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo/#ac83b44e69c9f9f4f9d60be2d72f4a5df">getFrameLowering</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a> = Fn.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo/#a43c530c830206ecf5ad3359364634c75">getRegisterInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackGrowsDown =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#aa76eab97e3072a1ebd4bf1ff00d19423">getStackGrowthDirection</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a453c74e2daac0745b53f8b31c11fc50cad1fc7c9d0bae5bf76a67d2d26ce99c1a">TargetFrameLowering::StackGrowsDown</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop over all of the stack objects, assigning sequential addresses...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = Fn.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a54f334a9c8ca6d105eae383ae87e4524">getFrameInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start at the beginning of the local area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Offset is the distance from the stack top in the direction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of stack growth -- so it&#39;s always nonnegative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalAreaOffset = TFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a6521d4d5560c03b2e6490883558b882c">getOffsetOfLocalArea</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackGrowsDown)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LocalAreaOffset = -LocalAreaOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LocalAreaOffset &gt;= 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">         &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Local area offset should be in direction of stack growth&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = LocalAreaOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are fixed sized objects that are preallocated in the local area,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-fixed objects can&#39;t be allocated right at the start of local area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We currently don&#39;t support filling in holes in between fixed sized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// objects, so we adjust &#39;Offset&#39; to point to the end of last fixed sized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preallocated object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ae70474766f2a88bab5b2b77bcb22212b">getObjectIndexBegin</a>(); i != 0; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t FixedOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackGrowsDown) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum distance from the stack pointer is at lower address of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the object -- which is given by offset. For down growing stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the offset is negative, so we negate the offset to get the distance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FixedOff = -MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum distance from the start pointer is at the upper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address of the object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FixedOff = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(i) + MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a9284fd53296d2a2f8ae654d000971000">getObjectSize</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FixedOff &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = FixedOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: We do not have a call stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> MaxAlign = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a3836203fac855ac3c5718b701bd13ffd">getMaxAlign</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No scavenger</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Once this is working, then enable flag will change to a target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check for whether the frame is large enough to want to use virtual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frame index registers. Functions which don&#39;t want/need this optimization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will continue to use the existing code path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a5990b78705882c9de507550bc81c40cb">getUseLocalStackAllocationBlock</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a38a536a09e7b29b14de24d3a0cb6f1b3">getLocalFrameMaxAlign</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust to alignment boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Local frame base offset: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Resolve offsets for objects in the local block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a23eb9fb6560e43fa6164b4ef35654628">getLocalFrameObjectCount</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair&lt;int, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a> = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a4987e73cba3f5835d640322be09d98bd">getLocalFrameObjectMap</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t FIOffset = (StackGrowsDown ? -<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;alloc FI(&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.first &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;) at SP&#91;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; FIOffset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#93;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a3cd29e7edbcaceb5834eaa7d089a5bc4">setObjectOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.first, FIOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate the local block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#aa306e1d00f65a9bb1030e66e9d195a69">getLocalFrameSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxAlign = std::max(Alignment, MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No stack protector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then assign frame offsets to stack objects that are not used to spill</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac51e2d34abb79b72afef355fac525c76">getObjectIndexEnd</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a11d6e0b1aa8f7709f0330318b2cc5f1b">isObjectPreAllocated</a>(i) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a5990b78705882c9de507550bc81c40cb">getUseLocalStackAllocationBlock</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have reserved argument space for call sites in the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediately on entry to the current function, count it as part of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a19e260b3bbf8fad8480d151e11919836">adjustsStack</a>() &amp;&amp; TFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a238c4b47777d9678c89b6ccfa9db504c">hasReservedCallFrame</a>(Fn))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round up the size to a multiple of the alignment.  If the function has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any calls or alloca&#39;s, align to the target&#39;s StackAlignment value to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensure that the callee&#39;s frame or the alloca data is suitably aligned;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise, for leaf functions, align to the TransientStackAlignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> StackAlign;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StackAlign = TFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the frame pointer is eliminated, all frame offsets will be relative to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SP not FP. Align to MaxAlign so this works.</span></CodeLine>
